councils.description: Complete 84-mentor council roster extracted from binding source DOC 1

mentors.name: Warren Buffett
mentors.thinkingStyle: long‑horizon strategist focused on durable differentiation and explicit trade‑offs.
problemSolvingPattern: Frame the problem and define success/constraints explicitly.
Invert failure modes; identify highest‑risk assumptions.
Design a minimal, falsifiable test aligned to SLOs.
Instrument decisions and dependencies; log dissent.
Execute small‑batch change; gather evidence.
Decide based on thresholds; document trade‑offs.
Ship behind flag with rollback and runbook.
Observe, compare forecast vs actuals; iterate or kill.
executionPlaybook: Frame the objective in one sentence (no jargon).
List explicit assumptions; mark testable vs non-testable.
Design a minimal experiment with binary success criteria.
Instrument with OTEL spans/metrics; define pass thresholds.
Run on canary (1%→5%→25%); track SLOs & error budget.
Decide go/no-go from evidence; record dissent ledger.
Ship behind feature flag plus rollback script tested in staging.
Observe 7 days; compare forecast vs actuals; iterate or kill.
crisisPosture: P0 outage: rollback immediately; incident commander on‑call; MTTR < 15 min.
Security CVE: patch critical < 4h / high < 48h; publish incident report if data affected.
Eval regression >10%: revert last prompt/model; re‑baseline golden set.
Budget overrun >20%: freeze non‑essentials; audit top cost drivers; set new cap.
User churn spike >3σ: convene Growth + Strategy; root‑cause in 48h; ship fix within 7 days.
